member.name: T:SVGImage.SVG.SvgIconBase
member.summary: This is an implementation of a markup extension that enables the creation of from SVG sources.

member.name: P:SVGImage.SVG.SvgIconBase.CultureInfo
member.summary: Gets or sets the main culture information used for rendering texts.
member.value: An instance of the specifying the main culture information for texts. The default is the English culture.

remarks.para: This is the culture information passed to the class instance for the text rendering.
The library does not currently provide any means of splitting texts into its multi-language parts.

member.name: P:SVGImage.SVG.SvgIconBase.AppName
member.summary: Gets or sets the project or application name of the target assembly.
member.value: A string specifying the application project name.
member.remarks: This is optional and is only used to resolve the resource Uri at the design time.

member.param: A specifying the source of the SVG resource.
member.returns: A of the converted SVG resource.
member.remarks: This uses the method to convert the SVG resource to , which is then wrapped in .

member.name: T:SVGImage.SVG.SvgIconConverterExtension
member.summary: This implements a markup extension that enables the creation of from SVG sources.
member.remarks:
The SVG source file can be:
From the web
From the local computer (relative or absolute paths)
From the resources.
The rendering settings are provided as properties for customizations.

member.overloads: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default parameters.

member.name: M:SVGImage.SVG.SvgIconConverterExtension.ProvideValue(System.IServiceProvider)
member.summary: Performs the conversion of a valid SVG source file to the that is set as the value of the target property for this markup extension.
member.param: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.
member.returns: This returns if successful; otherwise, it returns .

member.summary: Converts the SVG source file to
member.param: Object that can provide services for the markup extension.
member.returns: Returns the valid of the SVG source path if successful; otherwise, it returns .

member.name: T:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage
member.summary: This is the SVG image view control. The image control can either load the image from a file or by setting the object through , which allows multiple controls to share the same drawing instance.

member.name: T:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.eSizeType
member.summary: This controls how the image is stretched to fill the control,

member.name: F:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.eSizeType.None
member.summary: The image is not scaled. The image location is translated so the top left corner of the image bounding box is moved to the top left corner of the image control.

member.name: F:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.eSizeType.ContentToSizeNoStretch
member.summary: The image is scaled to fit the control without any stretching. Either X or Y direction will be scaled to fill the entire width or height.

member.name: F:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.eSizeType.ContentToSizeStretch
member.summary: The image will be stretched to fill the entire width and height.

member.name: F:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.eSizeType.SizeToContent
member.summary: The control will be resized to fit the un-scaled image. If the image is larger than the maximum size for the control, the control is set to maximum size and the image is scaled.

member.name: F:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.eSizeType.ViewBoxToSizeNoStretch
member.summary: Not the content of the image but its viewbox is scaled to fit the control without any stretching. Either X or Y direction will be scaled to fill the entire width or height.

member.name: F:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.UriSourceProperty
member.summary: Identifies the dependency property.

member.name: P:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.UriSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the path to the SVG file to load into this .
member.value: A specifying the path to the SVG source file. The file can be located on a computer, network or assembly resources. Settings this to will close any opened diagram.
member.remarks: This is the same as the property, and added for consistency.

member.name: P:SVGImage.SVG.SVGImage.BaseUri
